title: Ep. 18: 'The Watch'
description:
Chris and Andy celebrate the return of Jason Bourne, break down Beyoncé's big weekend, discuss Kanye's tough Tuesday on Twitter, and talk in-depth about the Bronco episode of FX's 'The People v. O.J. Simpson: American Crime Story.'
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
